        public Arena getArena()

        Returns:
        The Arena Object for this event.

      • shouldLetNovaGamesHandle

        public java.lang.Boolean shouldLetNovaGamesHandle()
        Gets whether or not NovaGames will handle unloading this arena, or if the specific minigames plugin will. If not, NovaGames will simply 'unload' or mark the arena as being unloaded for NovaGames. This is true by default.
        Returns:
        true if NovaGames is to handle unloading, else false.

      • setArena

        public void setArena(Arena _arena)
        Sets the Arena Object for this event. This is only needed if shouldLetNovaGamesHandle() is false.
        Parameters:
        _arena - The Arena for this event.
